product_name: The North Face  Better Than Naked Singlet - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked singlet features seamless construction and FlashDryTM technology for quick-drying comfort when racing or training.
short_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked singlet features seamless construction and FlashDryTM technology for quick-drying comfort when racing or training.
